forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers this afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 61F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
